species.name: swampert
descriptions: If it senses the approach of a storm and a tidal wave, it protects its seaside nest by piling up boulders. It swims as fast as a jet ski.
It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.
Its arms are hard as rock. With one swing, it can break a boulder into pieces.
Swampert is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This Pok√©mon also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
Swampert predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in the sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm is approaching, it piles up boulders to protect itself.
